content: BRUSSELS U.S. laser tools and systems maker Coherent Inc  has offered to sell a unit to allay EU competition concerns over its $942 million bid for laser manufacturer Rofin-Sinar Technologies Inc   a person familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
name: Coherent Inc
title: Laser tool maker Coherent offers asset sale over Rofin buy: source

content: BRUSSELS  Oct 6 U.S. laser tools and systems maker Coherent Inc has offered to sell a unit to allay EU competition concerns over its $942 million bid for laser manufacturer Rofin-Sinar Technologies Inc  a person familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
name: Coherent Inc
title: Laser tool maker Coherent offers asset sale over Rofin buy - source

content: * Rofin-Sinar Technologies - holders of more than 95 pct of shares of company's common stock present and voting at special meeting voted in favor of deal
name: Coherent Inc
title: BRIEF-Rofin-Sinar stockholders approve acquisition by Coherent

content: Laser tools and systems maker Coherent Inc  said it would buy laser developer and manufacturer Rofin-Sinar Technologies Inc  in a deal valued at about $942 million.
name: Coherent Inc
title: Coherent to buy Rofin in deal valued at about $942 million

content: * Deal expected to be accretive to eps in first full year following close
name: Coherent Inc
title: BRIEF-Coherent to acquire Rofin-Sinar for about $942 mln

content: March 16 Laser tools and systems maker Coherent Inc said it would buy laser developer and manufacturer Rofin-Sinar Technologies Inc in a deal valued at about $942 million.

title: UPDATE 1-Coherent to buy Rofin in deal valued at about $942 mln
